data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Manche, Normandie, France.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Manche, Normandie, France
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Manche, Normandie, France the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.section_summary: On average, 33 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Manche, Normandie, France.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Lord, please give the 6,341 believers in the county of Manche the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 6,341 believers in Manche to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 509,758 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Tourlaville
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Tourlaville, Normandie, France.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Manche, Normandie, France into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 6,341 believers in Manche, Normandie, France how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.section_summary:
the county of Manche, Normandie, France has a population of 516,100.

We estimate Manche has 6,341 people who might know Jesus, 315,605 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 194,153 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 6,341 believers in Manche to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

location.cities_list: Saint Helier, Cherbourg-Octeville, Saint-Lô, Équeurdreville-Hainneville, Tourlaville
